entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 8:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
